resource.description: Optional. The Backup event payload. Unset for deletion events.

auth.description: The auth context within all ChangeEvent events.

Data.title: ChangeEvent Event Data
Data.description: The data within all ChangeEvent events.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity generating the event

type.description: The type of the entity generating the event

name.description: Name of the entity generating the event

email.description: Email of the user generating the event

sourceIp.description: IP address of the user generating the event

agent.description: The software that made the request

Auth.title: Auth
Auth.description: Auth information of the generated event

href.description: Link to the resource that has generated the event

type.description: Type of the resource generating the event

uuid.description: Equinix assigned unique identifier of the resource generating the event

name.description: Name of the resource generating the event

state.description: State of the resource generating the event

description.description: Description of the resource generating the event

change.description: Change information for the resource that fired the event

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Schema of the resource that fired the event

uuid.description: Uuid of the of change for the resource target of the event

type.description: Type of the change happening on the resource for the target of the event

status.description: Status of the change event on the resource target

createdDateTime.description: The time that the resource that fired the event was created

op.description: The operation performed on the resource under change

path.description: The attribute on the resource being changed

value.description: The current value of the attribute under change

previousValue.description: The previous value of the attribute under change
